queries.select: select r.idrifornimento, r.km, r.data, r.prezzo, r.costolitro, r.note , e.idevento, e.evento, e.note as desevento , a.idauto, a.marca + ' - ' + a.modello as automodello, a.note as noteauto , t.idtipoalimentazione, t.tipoalimentazione, t.note as notetipoalimentazione , u.nome, u.note as noteutente , r2.idrifornimento as idprev , datediff(day, r2.data, r.data) as giorni, r2.data as dataprev, r2.km as kmprev , r.km - r2.km as kmpercorsi , (cast((r.km - r2.km) as float) / (case datediff(day, r2.data, r.data) when 0 then 1 else datediff(day, r2.data, r.data) end )) as kmgiorno , (r.km - r2.km) / (r2.prezzo / r2.costolitro) as kmlitro from [rifornimentoauto] r left join [rifornimentoauto] r2 on r.idauto = r2.idauto and r2.km = (select max(km) from rifornimentoauto where km < r.km and idauto = r.idauto) left join eventi e on e.idevento = r.idevento left join [auto] a on a.idauto = r.idauto left join tipialimentazione t on t.idtipoalimentazione = a.idtipoalimentazione left join utenti u on u.idutente = a.idutente where a.idutente in ({@method='info',string:userVisibility}) and ('{@qrypar='from'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='from'}' <> '' and r.data >= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='from'}', 112))) and ('{@qrypar='to'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='to'}' <> '' and r.data <= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='to'}', 112)))
